entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a young wizard who is trying to cast spells.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A Death Eater and a teacher at Hogwarts, who is blocking Harry's spells.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, whose house is on fire.

relationships.description: Snape blocks Harry's spells with his wand.
Hagrid owns the house that is on fire.
